Text:

Great upload. Amazing quality. Please keep up the good work. Quick question, I realize this will be borderline noob, where are the subs located. I've found the movie and it plays amazingly on my laptop, I just can't seem to find the subs. thanks again
There are no subtitles for this.
my bad i had to enable it on the player. note to other users.
When I try to activate the English subtitles on VLC, it doesn't work. There are two in English and one in Hrvatski, niether of them work. Any suggestions?
I'd like to raise the same query as magnus_lo, the subs show in the menu of VLC but don't appear when selected.
